text: ninnalil cilarkk cilarekkal kututalayi allahu nalkiya anugrahannaleat ninnalkk meaham teannarut‌. purusanmar sampadiccuntakkiyatinre ohari avarkkunt‌. strikal sampadiccuntakkiyatinre ohari avarkkumunt‌. allahuveat avanre audaryattil ninn ninnal avasyappettukealluka. tirccayayum allahu et karyattepparriyum arivullavanakunnu
